Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CustomerInfoController
    This class is a controller for the customer dashboard screen that provides logic for displaying, adding, deleting and updating the customer tableview.
    DashboardController
    A controller class that provider logic for the dashboard screen, the main screen for the application.
    LoginController
    This class is a controller for the log in screen and provides all logic for sign in actions, error messages and local time zone.
    NewAppointmentController
    A controller class for the New Appointment screen, provides logic to save a new appointment or cancel adding a new appointment.
    NewCustomerController
    A controller class that provides logic for the new customer screen to update a customer info or cancel the action.
    ReportDashboardController
    A controller class that providers logic for the report dashboard, allows user to click on one of 3 reports to view report.
    ReportsByContactController
    A controller class for the Report By Contact tableview which displays appointment count by month.
    ReportsByCountryController
    A controller class for the Reports By Country screen, shows a list of appointments in a tableview by country selected from a drop down combo box.
    ReportsByMonthController
    A controller class that provides logic for the Reports By Month screen, shows a list of appointments count by month.
    UpdateAppointmentController
    A controller class that provides logic for the update appointment controller, allows user to udpate a selected appointment or cancel the action.
    UpdateCustomerController
    A controller class that provides logic for the update customer screen, allows user to update an existing customer's information or cancel the action.
